title: Ep 75: Person of Intensity with Samee Junio
itunes:title: Ep 75: Person of Intensity with Samee Junio
itunes:subtitle: This week, Kate is joined by a guest host who’s been with Forever35 since Day 1: producer Samee Junio. They discuss Samee’s online dating ups and downs, the challenges that come with being an intense person who struggles with boundaries, thriving in ch...
description:
This week, Kate is joined by a guest host who’s been with Forever35 since Day 1: producer Samee Junio. They discuss Samee’s online dating ups and downs, the challenges that come with being an intense person who struggles with boundaries, thriving in challenging work situations, and how going to the gym is self-care. Samee’s new show Historical Roasts is on Netflix now!

Follow us on Instagram: @Forever35podcast, @katespencer, @doree, Twitter: @forever35pod, and in ourFacebook group ( password is "serums"). All products mentioned on the show can be found on our website, Forever35podcast.com. To leave us a voicemail, call 781-591-0390, or you can email us at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

This episode is sponsored by:

  • StoryWorth - Visit storyworth.com/forever35 for $20 off when you subscribe.
  • Scentbird - For 50% off your first month visit scentbird.com/forever35 and use promo code FOREVER35.
  • ThirdLove - For 15% off your first order go to thirdlove.com/forever.
  • Pretty Litter - For 20% off your first order visit prettylitter.com and use promo code FOREVER35.
  • Care.com - To save 30% off a Care Premium membership, visit care.com/forever35.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
